Package com.flag4j.linalg

Class Decompose

java.lang.Object
com.flag4j.linalg.Decompose
public final class Decompose extends Object
This class provides methods for several matrix decompositions.

  • Method Details

    • lu

      public static Matrix[] lu​(Matrix A)

      Computes the LU factorization of a matrix using partial pivoting. That is, decomposes an m-by-n matrix A into PA=LU where P is a permutation matrix, L is a unit lower triangular matrix, and U is an upper triangular matrix.

      Parameters:
      A - Matrix to decompose.
      Returns:
      Returns an array of matrices containing in order {P, L, U} corresponding to PA=LU.

    • lu

      public static CMatrix[] lu​(CMatrix A)

      Computes the LU factorization of a complex matrix using partial pivoting. That is, decomposes an m-by-n matrix A into PA=LU where P is a permutation matrix, L is a unit lower triangular matrix, and U is an upper triangular matrix.

      Parameters:
      A - Matrix to decompose.
      Returns:
      Returns an array of matrices containing in order {P, L, U} corresponding to PA=LU. Note, although P is always real, it will be wrapped in a complex Matrix.

    • qr

      public static Matrix[] qr​(Matrix A)
      Compute the full QR factorization of a matrix using Householder reflectors. That is, decomposes an m-by-n matrix A into A=QR where Q is an orthogonal matrix and R is an upper triangular matrix.
      Parameters:
      A - Matrix to decompose.
      Returns:
      Returns an array of matrices containing in order {Q, R} corresponding to A=QR.

    • qr

      public static CMatrix[] qr​(CMatrix A)
      Compute the full QR factorization of a matrix using Householder reflectors. That is, decomposes an m-by-n matrix A into A=QR where Q is unitary matrix and R is an upper triangular matrix.
      Parameters:
      A - Matrix to decompose.
      Returns:
      Returns an array of matrices containing in order {Q, R} corresponding to A=QR.

    • cholesky

      public static Matrix cholesky​(Matrix src)
      Computes the cholescky decomposition of a symmetric positive-definite matrix. That is, decomposes a symmetric positive-definite matrix A into A=LL<sup>T</sup> where L is a lower triangular.
      Parameters:
      src - The matrix to decompose. Must be symmetric positive-definite.
      Returns:
      The L matrix corresponding to A=LL<sup>T</sup>.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If src is not symmetric positive-definite.

    • cholesky

      public static CMatrix cholesky​(CMatrix src)
      Computes the cholescky decomposition of a symmetric positive-definite matrix. That is, decomposes a symmetric positive-definite matrix A into A=LL<sup>*</sup> where L is lower triangular.
      Parameters:
      src - The matrix to decompose. Must be symmetric positive-definite.
      Returns:
      The L matrix corresponding to A=LL<sup>*</sup>.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If src is not symmetric positive-definite.
